text: Aybol Abiken (, ; born 1 June 1996) is a Kazakhstani footballer who plays as a defender for Kairat and the Kazakhstan national team. ==Career== ===Club=== Abiken made his professional debut for FC Kairat in the Kazakhstan Premier League on 29 April 2017, coming on as a substitute in the 87th minute for Bauyrzhan Islamkhan in the match against FC Akzhayik, which finished as a 4–1 home win. On 25 November 2019, Abiken signed a new three-year contract with FC Kairat. ===International=== Abiken made his Kazakhstan national football team debut on 9 September 2019 in a Euro 2020 qualifier against Russia.
